name: Tiberian War: Ion Shock
summary:
Starting as a visual mod, it grew into a vision of the Tiberium world that is more dangerous and catastrophic. 
Taking inspiration from 80s action films like aliens, terminator and blade runner, the mod brings the explosive and violent nature of a war between two differing factions. 
Mod feature included: 
- Expanding on the Tiberium life and environment 
- Expanding the arsenal of both factions with new units 
- Expending on the terrain interactivity and gameplay 
- Graphically enhancing the user experience without deviating from the original feel of the game
